author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Summer festivals in Germany to boost tourism numbers!Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Summer festivals in Germany to boost tourism numbers! Published on : Tuesday, July 14, 2015
Summertime is festival time! Fans of electronic music can look forward to two highlights in Germany this summer.
From 31 July to 2 August 2015, the big bass sounds of the Nature One festival will be resonating from the former Pydna missile base near the small Hunsrück town of Kastellaun. You can dance the night away to a whole host of international acts such as Axwell & Ingrosso.
Those who want to carry on partying can head straight to the SonneMondSterne festival in Erfurt, which takes place from 7 to 9 August 2015. Calvin Harris and The Chemical Brothers are among the big names in this year’s line-up.
Source: GNTB
